review: First of all I would like to thank Dr. Bhushan Sabnis for being so friendly and optimistic towards his patients. He is one of the best orthopedic surgeon I ever came across. No matter how complex your case is he will come up with the best solution and will make sure you get cured. Dr. Bhushan Sabnis is such a humble human being, he will give ample amount of time to his patients and will make sure they have no doubts in his/her mind (ideally very few people do this). Recently, I went through one complex knee surgery which was excellently performed by Dr. Bhushan Sabnis and his team. I am just grateful to God that I came across such wonderful and intellectual Doctor. I am just short of words to express my gratitude towards Dr. Bhushan Sabnis. Hats off to his work! and Hats off to his team! Thank you so much Dr. Bhushan Sabnis for all your efforts and guidance.

My Mom got patella fracture.
All thanks to Dr Sabnis, He is one of the coolest Doctors I have ever seen the surgery he performed was so smooth and Dr took very good care of my mom , He understands your concerns and will make sure you are stress free.
We are blessed to have Dr Sabnis to take care of my mom fracture
Dr. Sabnis , a big Thank you for all the support. He is very well experienced  Dr and  a kind person.  With his kind words  the patients are relaxed. Iam very thankful for treatment.

Dr.Bhushan Sabnis Sir is experience doctor and his supportive nature, good human being. I was suffered from both foot anchor cracks and visited to Sport Med Hospital at Parel, Mumbai. Then got appointment of Dr. Sabnis Sir and gave me the medical treatment and next time he knowing the I am working in the Mumbai Police and deputation in the NIA then he had not take his consulting fees. 
Thanks Doctor Sir
